I20041207-0800-gtk

No steps, sorry. Found this in the log:

!ENTRY org.eclipse.core.runtime 4 2 2004-12-07 20:37:03.229
!MESSAGE An internal error occurred during: "Synchronize View: Processing label
changes".
!STACK 0
java.lang.NullPointerException
	at
org.eclipse.team.internal.ui.synchronize.CompositeModelProvider.hasViewerState(CompositeModelProvider.java:278)
	at
org.eclipse.team.internal.ui.synchronize.AbstractSynchronizeModelProvider.reset(AbstractSynchronizeModelProvider.java:303)
	at
org.eclipse.team.internal.ui.synchronize.SynchronizeModelUpdateHandler.processEvent(SynchronizeModelUpdateHandler.java:247)
	at
org.eclipse.team.internal.core.BackgroundEventHandler.processEvents(BackgroundEventHandler.java:310)
	at
org.eclipse.team.internal.core.BackgroundEventHandler$1.run(BackgroundEventHandler.java:154)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:66)

I can't see how this NPE could happen since the instance variable involved is
never null. I did notice that it was non-final and package private. I've made it
final and private just in case.
'resourceToElements' is final and private now. Verified for 3.1M4
